mapper.select: SELECT empno, ename, job FROM emp
SELECT ename FROM emp WHERE empno = #{empNo}
SELECT ename, job FROM emp WHERE ename like '%L%L%'
SELECT ename, comm FROM emp WHERE comm is null

SELECT ename, hiredate FROM emp WHERE
hiredate >= '1980-12-17' and hiredate <= '1982-01-23'
SELECT empno, ename, job, comm FROM emp WHERE job = #{job} and sal >= #{sal}
select ename, SAL from emp where (DEPTNO = 10 or DEPTNO = 30) and SAL > #{sal}
select * from emp where MGR is null
select ename, job, hiredate, sal from emp where date_format(HIREDATE, '%Y') = #{year}
select ename, sal from emp where date_format(HIREDATE, '%m') = #{month}
select EMPNO, ENAME, HIREDATE from emp where JOB = #{job}

select e.empno, e.ename, e.job, e.mgr, e.hiredate, e.sal, e.comm, e.deptno, d.deptno, d.dname, d.loc
from emp e inner join dept d on e.deptno = d.deptno where e.empno = #{empno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO emp ( empno, ename, deptno, hiredate ) VALUES ( #{empno}, #{ename}, (select d.DEPTNO from emp e right join dept d on e.DEPTNO = d.DEPTNO where e.DEPTNO is null ), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT d.DEPTNO FROM emp e right join dept d ON e.DEPTNO = d.DEPTNO WHERE e.DEPTNO is null
select count(ENAME) from emp where ENAME like CONCAT(#{first}, '%')
